name: A pair of voidplate gauntlets
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance adequately.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
